text: bhala tumane us shakhsh ko bhee dekha hai jisane apanee naphasiyaanee khavaahishon ko maabood bana rakha hai aur (usakee haalat) samajh boojh kar khuda ne use gumaraahee mein chhod diya hai aur usake kaan aur dil par alaamat muqarrar kar dee hai (ki ye eemaan na laega) aur usakee onkh par parda daal diya hai phir khuda ke baad usakee hidaayat kaun kar sakata hai to kya tum log (itana bhee) gaur nahin karate
